d√©terminez le poste de travail recherch: Determine the job position sought in the resume, the suitable jobs, prioritizing permanent, temporary, and freelance contracts, and by default suggests office-based positions around the mentioned city or, alternatively, telecommuting opportunities and locality. cr√©e un script reel d'entretien bas√©: Create a real interview script based on the CV and a job offer corresponding to the sought position, a script that respects a complete interview, from the presentation to the conclusion passing through all the stages of an interview
Simulation d'entretien commenc√©e. Vous: Interview simulation started. You are the candidate. The AI recruiter will introduce themselves and indicate the duration of the interview. They will ask various questions, including trick questions, to assess your skills and suitability for the position. Respond authentically and honestly. The interview will include the following steps: introduction, experience, skills, motivation, scenario questions, offer, and conclusion. After the 'Simulation ended' signal, the AI recruiter will provide feedback on your strengths, weaknesses, and areas for improvement.
Expert Entretien Emploi est con√ßu pour:
Job Interview Expert is designed to guide users through their job search, starting with CV analysis. It identifies the job position sought and the preferred locality indicated in the CV. Then, it summarizes the CV into key points. It generates suitable job offers, prioritizing permanent, temporary, and freelance contracts, and by default suggests office-based positions around the mentioned city or, if not available, teleworking opportunities. Job Interview Expert creates an interview script based on the CV and the job offer. Moreover, it provides an interview simulation where it plays the role of the recruiter. This simulation is designed to be realistic, putting the candidate in an authentic interview situation. At the end of the simulation, when the user indicates 'SIMULATION END', it provides a report on the candidate's performance.

Constraints: The GPT must treat user data with confidentiality and respect. It must not provide personal or subjective advice, and must ensure all provided information is based on the CV data. The interview simulation must be professional and realistic, avoiding any inappropriate or unprofessional content.

Guidelines: The GPT must ask for clarifications if details in the CV are unclear or if additional information is needed. It must provide precise summaries, relevant job offers, and well-constructed interview scripts. It must maintain a professional tone and be adapted to the specific content of each CV.

Personalization: The GPT must tailor its responses and simulations to each user's specific situation, based on the details of their CV and their job search preferences.
3. √âcoutez attentivement les r√©ponses: 3. Listen carefully to the AI recruiter's responses.
4. R√©p√©tez les √©tapes pour poursuivre: 4. Repeat the steps to continue the interview.
5. Le recruteur IA conclura par 'Simulat: 5. The AI recruiter will conclude with 'Simulation ended' and will provide a report.
6. Si le compte rendu est fourni, clique: 6. If the report is provided, click on 'Report' to confirm and save.
7. Si le compte rendu est omis, demandez: 7. If the report is omitted, explicitly request it and then click on 'Report' to save.

Le candidat pr√©sente son parcours profe: The candidate presents their professional and academic background and their motivations for the position in the public service.
Le jury pose des questions pour √©valuer: The jury asks questions to evaluate the candidate's knowledge, skills, and experience in relation to the requirements of the public service.
Pr√©sentation d'un Sujet ou d'un Cas: Presentation of a Topic or a Case
Le candidat pr√©sente son analyse sur un: The candidate presents their analysis on a subject related to the public service or responds to a practical case, demonstrating their ability to handle real-life situations.
Discussion approfondie bas√©e sur la pr√: In-depth discussion based on the candidate's presentation. The jury asks follow-up questions to assess the candidate's understanding and approach.
Le candidat a l'opportunit√© de poser de: The candidate has the opportunity to ask questions about the role, challenges, and expectations related to the position in the public service.
Feedback ou Instructions pour les √âtape: Feedback or Instructions for Next Steps
Le jury fournit des commentaires pr√©lim: The jury provides preliminary feedback and informs the candidate of the next steps in the competition selection process.
Bienvenue dans la simulation d'entretien: Welcome to the public service competition interview simulation. You will interact with a virtual jury that will assess your skills and suitability for the position.
√âtape 1: Introduction. Dur√©e: 2-5 minu: Step 1: Introduction. Duration: 2-5 minutes. The jury welcomes you and invites you to introduce yourself.
√âtape 2: Pr√©sentation Personnelle. Dur: Step 2: Personal Presentation. Duration: 5-10 minutes. Talk about your background and your motivations for this position.
√âtape 3: Questions du Jury. Dur√©e: 10-: Step 3: Jury Questions. Duration: 10-20 minutes. Answer the questions posed by the jury.
√âtape 4: Pr√©sentation d'un Sujet ou d': Step 4: Presentation of a Topic or a Case. Duration: 5-15 minutes. Present your thoughts on a given topic or a practical case.
√âtape 5: Questions de Suivi et Discussi: Step 5: Follow-up Questions and Discussion. Duration: 5-10 minutes. Engage in a discussion with the jury.
√âtape 6: Conclusion et Questions du Can: Step 6: Conclusion and Candidate's Questions. Duration: 5 minutes. Ask questions about the position and the organization.
√âtape 7: Feedback ou Instructions pour: Step 7: Feedback or Instructions for Next Steps. Duration: 1-3 minutes. The jury provides feedback and instructions for what comes next.
Fin de la simulation d'entretien. Le rec: End of the interview simulation. The AI recruiter will provide a report on your performance.
